name: matching game for babies and children
name_original: matching game for babies and children
description:
Available languages​​: 33 languages ​​and dialects :

Albanian, German, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovenian, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.

presentation:
Warning, this game is designed specifically for children. Its graphics are colorful, the difficulty is low and the game is aimed at young people (under 10).

This is a matching game where you must find two identical images for faires disappear. Your child won when he made disappear all images.

The difficulty is measured for the youngest!

Features:
- This is a matching game
- Intuitive control, simple interface
- A simple game for younger where he can play without your help
- Gameplay and graphics suitable for children
